net.kencochrane.raven.event.interfaces

Class MessageInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kencochrane.raven.event.interfaces.MessageInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, SentryInterface

    public class MessageInterface
extends Object
implements SentryInterface
    The Message interface for Sentry allows to add a message that will be formatted by sentry.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageInterface

        @Deprecated
public MessageInterface(String message)
        Deprecated. Use EventBuilder.setMessage(String) instead.
        Creates a non parametrised message.

        While it's technically possible to create a non parametrised message with MessageInterface, it's recommended to use EventBuilder.setMessage(String) instead.

        Parameters:
        message - message to add to the event.
